ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($Setup.Global_Automation_Settings__c.Skip_Validation_Rule__c)&& NOT(ISNEW())&& NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption)&&(Override_Freight_Shipping__c = False && Override__c = False ) && (ISCHANGED( Shipping_Carrier__c ) || ISCHANGED( Shipping_Method__c ) ) && (ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Country__c, 'United States') || ISPICKVAL( Shipping_Country__c , 'Canada'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Override Multiline or override freight shipping should be true
